description: Structured information describing one version of a brain atlas.

alias._instruction: Enter the user-defined identifier for this brain atlas version (e.g. a short name).

alternativeVersionOf._instruction: Add one or several alternative versions of this brain atlas versions.

annotationSet._instruction: Add one or several annotations included in this brain atlas version.

coordinateSpace._instruction: Add the coordinate space in which this brain atlas version exists in.

fullName._instruction: Enter a descriptive name for this brain atlas version.

newVersionOf._instruction: Add the earlier version this brain atlas version is a new version of.

referenceDataset._instruction: Add the reference dataset for this brain atlas version.

relatedOntology._instruction: Enter the identifier (IRI) of the related ontological term that best describes this brain atlas version.

releaseDate._instruction: Enter the date of first broadcast/publication/release of this brain atlas version.

terminology._instruction: Add the terminology of this brain atlas version.

versionIdentifier._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this brain atlas version.

versionInnovation._instruction: Enter a short description of the novelties/peculiarities of this brain atlas version.
